* Make: Dell
* Brand: Lattitude
* Model: C400

=== Current Issues ===

* The scratchpad and PowerNow Deamon conflict causing scratchpad problems
* Suspend functions aren't quite right (details to be confirmed)
* Prism drivers don't seem to work with WiFi card in PCMCIA slot
* 7.04: Closing lid then reopening crashes GUI (fix written for Edgy also works in Fiesty: http://supernovae.in2p3.fr/~guy/linux/)
* 7.04: CTRL+ALT+F1 screen resolution wrong
